"The Creator Phantom":
"We have detected the appearance of an
almighty Phantom over the Pacific Ocean.
Having gathered Ether from all over the
Earth, it is trying to remake the world.
All ARKS members, dispatch immediately
and put an end to its plans.
――――――――――――――――――――
Quest Clear Limit: $(0) time(s)
Max Damage Cap: 999999
Failure Conditions: Time limit expires."

"We will begin the operation to
destroy the world tree growing in
the center of a Phantom continent,
appearing over the Pacific Ocean."

"If you defeat the Phantom God
in control of all this, the tree
should disappear along with
the continent. A difficult battle
lies ahead, please be careful!"
